sql.where:
bill.deleted = 0 AND detail.fee != 0
and
bill.company_id = #{companyParam.companyId}
and if(LENGTH(bill.payment_date)=7,DATE_FORMAT(bill.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d'),bill.payment_date) >= DATE_FORMAT(#{companyParam.setBalanceDate},'%Y-%m-%d')

mapper.select:
SELECT bill.id, bill.payment_date AS profitDate, IF( bill.fee_unit = 1, bill.fee * 10000, fee ) AS profitFee, bill.pay_type AS profitType, bill.bill_description AS feeName, IF( bill.pay_type = 1,fcompany.company_name, IF( bill.fee_type IN (5, 6), '--', tocompany.company_name )) AS fromCompanyName, bill.project_name AS projectName, CASE bill.fee_type WHEN 1 THEN '合同回款' WHEN 2 THEN '技术审查费' WHEN 3 THEN '合作设计费' WHEN 4 THEN '其他收支' WHEN 5 THEN '报销申请' WHEN 6 THEN '费用申请' WHEN 7 THEN '固定支出' ELSE '其他' END as feeTypeName from maoding_web_company_bill bill LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_relation relation ON bill.id = relation.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company fcompany ON relation.from_company_id = fcompany.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company tocompany ON relation.to_company_id = tocompany.id
order by bill.payment_date desc,bill.create_date DESC

SELECT bill.id, bill.payment_date AS profitDate, sum(IF( bill.fee_unit = 1, detail.fee * 10000, detail.fee )) AS profitFee, bill.pay_type AS profitType, detail.fee_description AS feeName, ifnull(fcompany.company_name,payer_name) as fromCompanyName, if(bill.fee_type IN (5, 6), '--',ifnull(tocompany.company_name,payee_name)) as toCompanyName, if(fee_type = 1,bill.payer_name, IF( bill.pay_type = 1,fcompany.company_name, IF( bill.fee_type IN (5, 6), '--', tocompany.company_name )))AS relationCompanyName, bill.project_name AS projectName, detail.exp_type_name as feeTypeName, detail.exp_type_parent_name as feeTypeParentName from maoding_web_company_bill bill INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_detail detail on bill.id = detail.bill_id INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_relation relation ON bill.id = relation.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company fcompany ON relation.from_company_id = fcompany.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company tocompany ON relation.to_company_id = tocompany.id
group by bill.id,detail.exp_type_name order by bill.payment_date desc,bill.create_date DESC

select count(1) from (SELECT bill.id from maoding_web_company_bill bill INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_detail detail ON bill.id = detail.bill_id INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_relation relation ON bill.id = relation.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company fcompany ON relation.from_company_id = fcompany.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company tocompany ON relation.to_company_id = tocompany.id )a

SELECT sum(IF(pay_type=1,if(fee_unit=1,detail.fee*10000,detail.fee),0)) as gain, sum(IF(pay_type=2,if(fee_unit=1,detail.fee*10000,detail.fee),0)) as pay from maoding_web_company_bill bill INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_detail detail on bill.id = detail.bill_id INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_relation relation ON bill.id = relation.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company fcompany ON relation.from_company_id = fcompany.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company tocompany ON relation.to_company_id = tocompany.id

SELECT sum(IF(pay_type=1,if(fee_unit=1,detail.fee*10000,detail.fee),0)) as gain, sum(IF(pay_type=2,if(fee_unit=1,detail.fee*10000,detail.fee),0)) as pay from maoding_web_company_bill bill INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_detail detail on bill.id = detail.bill_id INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_relation relation ON bill.id = relation.id

SELECT -- 收款 SUM(IF(pay_type=1 and exp_type_parent_name='合同回款',if(fee_unit=1,b.fee*10000,b.fee) ,0)) as contractRevenue, SUM(IF(pay_type=1 and exp_type_parent_name='技术审查费',if(fee_unit=1,b.fee*10000,b.fee) ,0)) as technologyRevenue, SUM(IF(pay_type=1 and exp_type_parent_name='合作设计费',if(fee_unit=1,b.fee*10000,b.fee) ,0)) as cooperationRevenue, SUM(IF(pay_type=1 and POSITION('其他' IN exp_type_parent_name),if(fee_unit=1,b.fee*10000,b.fee) ,0)) as otherRevenue, -- 付款 SUM(IF(pay_type=2 and exp_type_parent_name='主营业务税金及附加',if(fee_unit=1,b.fee*10000,b.fee) ,0)) as mainBusiness, SUM(IF(pay_type=2 and exp_type_parent_name='财务费用',if(fee_unit=1,b.fee*10000,b.fee) ,0)) as financialCost, SUM(IF(pay_type=2 and exp_type_parent_name='所得税费用',if(fee_unit=1,b.fee*10000,b.fee) ,0)) as incomeTax, SUM(IF(pay_type=2 and (exp_type_parent_name='直接人工成本' or exp_type_parent_name='直接项目成本' or fee_type <5),if(fee_unit=1,b.fee*10000,b.fee) ,0)) as mainBusinessCost, SUM(IF(pay_type=2 and (exp_type_parent_name='管理人员工资' or exp_type_parent_name='房屋物业费用' or exp_type_parent_name = '资产摊销' or exp_type_parent_name = '资产减值准备' or ((fee_type =5 or fee_type =6) and exp_type_parent_name!='直接项目成本') ),if(fee_unit=1,b.fee*10000,b.fee) ,0)) as managementFee, sum(if(pay_type=1,if(fee_unit=1,b.fee*10000,b.fee) ,0)) as countRevenue, sum(if(pay_type=2,if(fee_unit=1,b.fee*10000,b.fee) ,0)) as countExpenditure from maoding_web_company_bill a INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_detail b on a.id = b.bill_id

SELECT SUBSTR(payment_date,1,7) as timeData, SUM(IF(pay_type=1,if(fee_unit=1,fee*10000,fee) ,0)) as countExpenditure, SUM(IF(pay_type=2,if(fee_unit=1,fee*10000,fee) ,0)) as countRevenue from maoding_web_company_bill a
and payment_date is not null GROUP BY SUBSTR(payment_date,1,7)

SELECT SUBSTR(payment_date, 1, 7) AS paymentDate, SUM(if(fee_unit = 1, b.fee * 10000, b.fee)) AS paymentFee, pay_type, fee_type, b.exp_type_parent_name, b.exp_type_name FROM maoding_web_company_bill a INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_detail b ON a.id = b.bill_id WHERE a.deleted = 0
AND company_id in
#{companyId}
AND SUBSTR(payment_date, 1, 4) = #{date} GROUP BY pay_type, fee_type, b.exp_type_parent_name, b.exp_type_name, SUBSTR(payment_date, 1, 7)

SELECT a.company_name, sum(IF(pay_type=1,if(fee_unit=1,fee*10000,fee),0)) as gain, sum(IF(pay_type=2,if(fee_unit=1,fee*10000,fee),0)) as pay from maoding_web_company a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_bill b on a.id = b.company_id and b.deleted = 0
GROUP BY a.id

SELECT a.company_name,b.company_id,c.exp_type_parent_name, sum(if(fee_unit=1,b.fee*10000,b.fee)) as amount from maoding_web_company a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_bill b on a.id = b.company_id and b.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_detail c on b.id = c.bill_id
GROUP BY a.id,c.exp_type_parent_name

SELECT a.company_name,b.company_id, c.exp_type_parent_name, sum(if(fee_unit=1,c.fee*10000,c.fee)) as amount
,SUBSTR(b.payment_date, 1, 7) as paymentDate
,SUBSTR(b.payment_date, 1, 4) as paymentDate
from maoding_web_company a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_bill b on a.id = b.company_id and b.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_detail c on b.id = c.bill_id
GROUP BY c.exp_type_parent_name
,SUBSTR(b.payment_date, 1, 7)
,SUBSTR(b.payment_date, 1, 4)
order by SUBSTR(b.payment_date, 1, 7)

SELECT detail.exp_type_parent_name, if (detail.id is null, null, 1) as parent_level, detail.exp_type_name, if (detail.id is null, null, 2) as child_level, if (detail.id is null, null, 0) as selected from maoding_web_company_bill bill INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_detail detail on bill.id = detail.bill_id INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_bill_relation relation ON bill.id = relation.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company fcompany ON relation.from_company_id = fcompany.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company tocompany ON relation.to_company_id = tocompany.id
group by detail.exp_type_parent_name,detail.exp_type_name
